ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] The Sky is the limit
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This bug has been around for a while.  It usually happens when you try to loot a lore item off a corpse.  The game says the item is lore, it doesn t go
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 9 Mar 2000, Sylly Songsynger wrote:
>
> p.s. had a rather disturbing incident. logged in and when
> we were ready to rock, started to switch over to 6 note
> and Yk from the Lord Grim Scythe I was fooling around
> with. ack!!! no Yk?!?!?!?! "/auction did i loan my Yk
> to anyone last night?" Looked everywhere. Even did
> /corpse thinking maybe i did not fully loot my last
> corpse. Really puzzling. Not too happy. Thought about
> doing "/petition Help I lost my Yk to some kinda bug - can
> you give me a new one? Please!" but <fat chance> Finally,
> I died and got ressed back in. Woo Hoo!!!! There it is!
> My Missing Yk!!! For some odd reason, it was invis to me
> in my own inventory and only showed after I died and got
> ressed back. Spooky.

This bug has been around for a while. It usually happens when
you try to loot a lore item off a corpse. The game says the
item is lore, it doesn't go into your inventory, and it
disappears from view on the corpse. If you stand up and loot
again, it's back. As you found out, it also happens with
stuff in your inventory, though I haven't managed to duplicate
that reliably. Zoning or camping makes it reappear. And it
also happens with coin if you use the /split command too soon
after another split. It says you must wait, and if you don't
get disconnected, the money you tried to split disappears from
your inventory but isn't split. Once you zone, it's restored
though.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
